channel.title: Ask-Engines - The future of Search
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/72anbt.png[/img][/center] [center][size=24pt][b]Why Ask-Engines?[/b][/size] Ask Engine is an innovative place that you can find what ever you want and get a percise solution to your questions without any addons or uncontributing data. Ask Engine's Database is being built by users that join the project everyday. Each data that will be searched in the engine was put by hand and not by any crawler or something like that. Ask-Engine will be the new innovative search engine that people will come to, to get their questions answered. [size=24pt][b]What makes us different from Google?[/b][/size] Google's result is fetched by crawlers, these crawlers are not real people there for your results are not 100% accurate, and they fetch millions of results for your search, however our engine is constantly having its contents added by our team of member's making your result quick and to the point, giving you a 99.9% accuracy.
[size=24pt][b]Picture yahoo,Google,YouTube,Wikipedia,mediafire all in the one.. that's are goal[/b][/size]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2hx7pqh.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]Screen Shots:[/b][/size][/center]
[center][b]Homepage[/b][/center] [center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/21msri0.png[/img]
[b]Basic Commands:[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/34fcv40.png[/img]
[b]Image Search[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ln7d78.png[/img]
[size=18pt][b]Features: [/b][/size] Main feautres added in current build:
[b]Image:[/b] (Image name) [b]Whois:[/b] (Persons Name) [b]Play:[/b] (Song name) [b]Define:[/b] (Term Name) [b]Download:[/b] (File Name) [b]General Search[/b]
If you would like to help build up this projects database just comment below with your skype username ! anyone is welcome :) Thanks and i look forward to getting feedback[/center]

item.title: Ask-Engines - The future of Search
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

Blue Background will be changed.

There will be 2 search engines implanted

  1. Search Engine with Crawlers (like google, yahoo, msn, ask etc.)
  2. Self made search Engine (this is in progress and will always be in progress, the more people use ask engine that bigger the database for the self made search engine will be.)

Read full topic

p.s. the blue background is hideous

item.title: Ask-Engines - The future of Search
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh13 pkerjosh13
item.description:
@pkerjosh13 wrote:

[center][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Why Ask-Engines?[/size]
Ask Engine is an innovative place that you can find what ever you want and get a percise solution to your questions without any addons or uncontributing data. Ask Engine’s Database is being built by users that join the project everyday. Each data that will be searched in the engine was put by hand and not by any crawler or something like that. Ask-Engine will be the new innovative search engine that people will come to, to get their questions answered.
[size=24pt]What makes us different from Google?[/size]
Google’s result is fetched by crawlers, these crawlers are not real people there for your results are not 100% accurate, and they fetch millions of results for your search, however our engine is constantly having its contents added by our team of member’s making your result quick and to the point, giving you a 99.9% accuracy.

[size=24pt]Picture yahoo,Google,YouTube,Wikipedia,mediafire all in the one… that’s are goal[/size]

[/center]
